scripts.zip: npm run build && cd dist && bestzip ../cjgrok-extension.zip . && cd ..
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-version
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
